featured.text: If it is necessary to stay more than 14 days and less than 30 days, nationals of the specific countries holding a 14-day non-visa entry should in the meantime apply for a landing-visa with the authorized office in the CKS airport from the Bureau of Consular Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

definition.zh_def: 授權，允許某人或某機構進行特定行為或使用特定權限。
definition.en_def: To give official permission or approval for someone to do something.
definition.example: The manager will authorize the budget for the new project.
